data.actual_result: Only the first snowman is converted, the rest remain the same
data.expected_result: Cool snowmen in a line, all of the non android OS snowmen
data.short_description: Putting two or more snowmen emoji causes the rest to be converted into original OS emoji
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a place to type (where you have perms ofcourse) - Type in one of the two snowmen emoji - Type more than two of either kind - Send message and see
